hypothesis_content.title: BTC Dominance Hedge During Market Stress Events
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regimes (VIX > 30, DXY > 105, or major crypto exchange outflow events), when BTC dominance is below its 200-day SMA, it will rally to test the 200-day SMA within 7 days as capital flees altcoins for BTC's relative safety.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During market stress, crypto investors exhibit flight-to-quality behavior within the asset class. BTC serves as digital gold while altcoins suffer disproportionate selling. This creates predictable dominance rallies when stress coincides with below-average dominance levels.
entry_conditions: Market regime = STRESS (VIX > 30 OR DXY > 105 OR major exchange net outflow > $500M 24h)
BTC dominance 5-day performance > -5% (BTC holding up better than alts)
Top 10 altcoins by market cap show average 24h drop > BTC's 24h drop by 3+ percentage points
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC dominance fails to rally during stress events or altcoins outperform BTC, breaking the historical flight-to-quality pattern.
